0.text: Innate: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed and  life steal based on his missing health, up to 60% − 100% (based on level) bonus attack speed and 8% − 25% (based on level) life steal at 70% missing health.

Active: Olaf throws an axe to the target location that deals physical damage to enemies it passes through and  slows them for 1.5 − 2.5 (based on distance traveled) seconds. Enemy  champions hit are also inflicted with  20% armor reduction for 4 seconds.

1.text: Olaf grants  ghosting to  monsters that are hit or nearby when Undertow is cast for 6 seconds.

2.text: The axe remains in place for a duration equal to Undertow's cooldown, briefly granting  sight of its surroundings. Olaf can pick up the axe to reduce Undertow's  total cooldown to 2.5 seconds, which  resets the cooldown if that has already elapsed.

3.text: Undertow will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Olaf gains  bonus attack speed for 4 seconds and a  shield for 2.5 seconds with an amount that is capped at 70% missing health.

1.text: Tough It Out  resets Olaf's basic attack timer.

0.text: Active: Olaf strikes thunder onto the target enemy, dealing  true damage. If this kills the target, Olaf  heals for the  health cost.

1.text: Basic attacks  reduce Reckless Swing's cooldown by 1 second.

0.text: Passive: Olaf gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.

1.text: Active: Olaf becomes enraged for 3 seconds,  cleansing himself of all  crowd control and becoming  immune to them, as well as gaining  bonus attack damage and 10% increased size. For the first second of Ragnarok, he also gains  bonus movement speed while moving towards  visible enemy  champions within 2000 units.

2.text: Ragnarok's duration is increased by and up to 2.5 seconds for each basic attack  on-hit or cast of  Reckless Swing against an enemy  champion.
